#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#define blank 2147483647
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,m,n,count,empx,empy,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>m>>n;
		int a[m+1][n+1];
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
				cin>>a[i][j];
		for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
			a[i][n]=blank;
		for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
			a[m][i]=blank;
		
		empx=0;empy=0;
		count=0;
		while(!(a[empx+1][empy]==blank && a[empx][empy+1]==blank))
		{
			//cout<<empx<<"   "<<empy<<endl; 
			if(a[empx+1][empy]>a[empx][empy+1])
			{	empy=empy+1;    count++;}
			else if(a[empx+1][empy]<a[empx][empy+1])
			{	empx=empx+1;	count++;}
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
